original_text: And God called the light Day, and the darkness he called Night. And the evening and the morning were the first day.
korean_text: 하나님이 빛을 낮이라 부르시고 어둠을 밤이라 부르시니라 저녁이 되고 아침이 되니 이는 첫째 날이니라

sentences.original_text: And God called the light Day
and the darkness he called Night
And the evening and the morning
